name: Engineering Chemistry Lab
references: Charles Corwin, Introductory Chemistry laboratory manual: Concepts and Critical Thinking, Pearson Education, 2012.
David Collins, Investigating Chemistry: Laboratory Manual, Freeman & Co., 1st Edition, 2006.
experiments: Determination of available chlorine in bleaching powder and of iodine in Iodized salt
pH-metric titration of an acid vs a base
Conductometric titration of an acid vs a base
Potentiometric titration of Fe2+ against K2Cr2O7
Determination of rate of Corrosion of mild steel in acidic environment in the absence of presence of an inhibitor
Determination of Chlorophyll in Olive oil by using UV and Fluorescence spectroscopic techniques
Functional group analysis of organic compounds by using IR spectroscopic technique
Organic solvent evaporation by using rotary-evaporation technique
